system.descriptionText: Move ~2 Above Ground with minour adjusting possible. Can also move to Low Altitude. Ignores Difficult Terrain, gains +10 to Manoeuvrability. Cannot Fly properly as a Flyer can, but still crashes to the ground if immobilised.
